static method setCacheStorageMethod [line 166]

	

    

    

		static boolean setCacheStorageMethod(
[string
$method = PHPExcel_CachedObjectStorageFactory::cache_in_memory], [array
$arguments = array()])
    

    


	
		Set the method that should be used for cell cacheing





Tags:





  

    return:  Success or failure
  

  

    access:  public
  









	
        
Parameters:

    

    

          

        string  
        $method  
        Name of the cacheing method
      

          

        array  
        $arguments  
        Optional configuration arguments for the cacheing method
